description: A legendary fighter able to call on secret powers, he is an unrivaled practitioner of a martial art that fights violence with worse violence to enforce justice. http://anidb.net/ch7535 [Kenshirou] is the man with the seven scars, the heir to the ancient martial art of Hokuto Shinken. He is the Fist of The North Star. Hokuto Shinken is a masterful technique, based on the secret energy points of the human body that enable life. By striking them in various sequences, the practitioner of Hokuto Shinken can manipulate a persons body. Strike one combination and you cure disease. Another, and you wipe a man`s memories away. Strike another, and a persons body will rip itself apart...

REGULAR.description:
It`s the year 199x, and the world is enveloped in the fires of a nuclear holocaust. On the charred remains of the earth`s surface, few remaining groups of humans are struggling to survive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: God or Devil!? The Mightiest Man Appears in Hell
Kami ka Akuma ka!? Jigoku ni Arawareta Saikyou no Otoko
Ken, l’héritier de la Grande Ourse
Sotto il segno dell`Orsa Maggiore
神か悪魔か!? 地獄にあらわれた最強の男

REGULAR.description:
The rice seeds which an old man had been traveling with for half a year to bring back to his village are stolen from him. The seeds are returned and the old man is escorted back to his village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fante di Picche
Hissatsu Zankaiken!! Fumou no Kouya ni Ashita o Mita!!
La famine
The Fist of Lingering Regret and Certain Death!! The Future Is Sighted in the Barren Wasteland!!
必殺残悔拳!! 不毛の荒野に明日をみた!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro`s arch nemesis Shin who calls himself King Clan has captured Lin who was following Kenshiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikarinaki Machi ni Koken ga Moeta! Bakusatsu Goshi Retsudan
In the City Without Light, a Lone Fist Burns! The Furious Death by the Five Exploding Fingers
L`artiglio
L’homme aux 7 cicatrices
光なき街に孤拳が燃えた! 爆殺五指烈弾

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro has killed Shin`s subordinates. Shin orders Heart to exterminate Kenshiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attack the Bloody Cross! The Secret Technique, Death by Soft Strikes
Bloody Cross o Ute!! Hiken Juuhazan
Il gigante
Le piège de Shin
ブラッディクロスを撃て!! 秘拳・柔破斬

REGULAR.description:
A year ago, Shin betrayed his master`s orders and fought Kenshiro, stealing Kenshiro`s lover Yuria. Kenshiro goes alone to the fortress to look for Yuria, but no one is there.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Can the Flames of Love Burn in Hell? You Don`t Even Know You`re Already Dead!!
Jigoku ni Saku ka Ai no Honoo. Omae wa Mou Shinde Iru!!
Le retour de l’enfer
Ritorno dall`inferno
地獄に咲くか愛の炎. おまえはもう死んでいる!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro, Lin, and Bat arrive at a desert oasis. It`s a small but lively town, but it`s ruled by the "Divine Military," God`s Army, who on the surface protects the town while actually plundering its resources over and over again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Tehaisho. Nanatsu no Kizu no Ootoko o Nerae!
Berretti rossi
The Devil`s Hit List. Find the Man with the 7 Scars!
Une armée au service du mal
悪魔の手配書. 七つの傷の男を狙え!

REGULAR.description:
The new leader of God`s Army takes the people of the town hostage to lure Kenshiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutoudomo! Shi e no Byouyomi Yatte Mirukai
Ken prisonnier de l’armée divine
L`armata di Dio
Villains! How About Counting Down to Your Own Death?!
悪党ども! 死への秒よみやってみるかい

REGULAR.description:
In his search for the leader of God`s Army (The Colonel) Kenshiro enters the soaring tower within the base.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il colonnello
Keiraku Hikou o Tsuke! Akutoudomo ni Chinkonka wa Nai
La guerre des sens
Strike the Hidden Power Point! There`s No Requiem for the Wicked
経絡秘孔を突け! 悪党どもに鎮魂歌はない

REGULAR.description:
In exchange for access to the lake, a witch named Patora demands village people work as slaves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutoudomo! Shinumae ni Inori o Sumasero!!
La montagna magica
Seroiamo le maléfique
Villains! Finish Your Prayers Before You Die!
悪党ども! 死ぬ前に 祈りをすませろ!!

REGULAR.description:
Pastora and Dragon are controlling the lake`s water and afflict the village people.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inverse Raging Fire Punch! There Are Too Many Who Deserve to Die!!
Ken face au dragon
L`uomo di fuoco
Rekka Gyakuryuuken! Shisubeki Yatsura ga Oosugiru!!
烈火逆流拳! 死すべき奴らが多すぎる!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro returns water to the well, as Toyo who is Bat`s foster parent, wishes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutoudomo! Jigoku no Blues o Kike!!
I guerrieri
Le voleur d’eau
Villains!! Listen to the Blues of Hell!!
悪党ども! 地獄のブルースを聞け!!

REGULAR.description:
In order to avenge Toyo, who dies protecting the children of the village, Kenshiro chases Jackal while defeating members of the Warriors one after another.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Am Death Itself!! I`ll Chase You to the Ends of Hell!
L`inseguimento
La mort est au bout de l’enfer
Ore wa Shinigami!! Jigoku no Hate made Oitsumete Yaru!!
俺は死神!! 地獄の果まで 追いつめてやる!!

REGULAR.description:
Joker takes away Jackal and orders to restrain Devil`s Rebirth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arhat Deva Fist! Once Released, There`s No Stopping It!!
Le coup du diable
Rakan Niouken! Ugoki Dashitara Mou Tomaranai!!
Un colpo micidiale
羅漢仁王拳! 動きだしたら もう止まらない!!

REGULAR.description:
Duran gains the trust of the villagers and is living among them, he actually held a candle to the devil with Dante before.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Miserable Era! The Good Die So Young!!
Fukou na Jidai Da! Zenninhodo Hayaji ni Suru!!
Le temps de la misère
Un uomo giusto
不幸な時代だ! 善人ほど早死にする!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and his gang arrive in a town with a haunting sound of an ominous bell. The town is dominated by Zaria with Dark Bell Fist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3つ数えてみろ! 死ぬのはおまえだ!!
Il villaggio degli zombi
Mitsu Kazoete Miro! Shinu no wa Omae Da!!
Try Counting to Three! You`re the One To Die!!
À trois tu meurs

REGULAR.description:
A boy named Sera tells Kenshiro about suffering villagers caught in the middle of a power struggle between two violent gangs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutoudomo Utatte Miruka! Jigoku no Kazoe Uta!!
Les loups entre eux
Serpenti e scorpioni
Villains, Want to Try Singing? Hell`s Counting Rhyme!!
悪党ども歌ってみるか! 地獄の数え唄!!

REGULAR.description:
Shin gathers his entire elite King Army in order to consolidate his power to defeat Kenshiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Man Lives to Fight! The Door to the Showdown Opens!
L`adunata
La trahison
Tatakaeba Koso Otoko! Taiketsu no Mon wa Tsui ni Hirakareta!
戦えばこそ男! 対決の門は遂に開かれた!

REGULAR.description:
The fully assembled King Army assaults a village Ken was visiting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attacco generale
Le loup des steppes
Life or Death!? Beyond the Wasteland Lie the First Avenue of Hell!
Sei ka Shi ka!? Kouya no Hate wa Jigoku no Ichoume!!
生か死か!? 荒野の果ては地獄の一丁目!!

REGULAR.description:
Garekki and Goldwolf attack Jennifer`s village. Meanwhile, Temjina, who was about to be executed for letting Yuria escape, is set free.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutoudomo! Shi e no Katamichikippu o Youishiro!!
Il sacrificio
L’oeil du dragon
Villains! Have Your One-Way Ticket to Death!!
悪党ども! 死への片道切符を用意しろ!!

REGULAR.description:
With the information Temjina sacrificed his life to give, Kenshiro and the others head for Southern Cross.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Nightmare Battle! My Fist Is a Million Volts!
Akumu no Souryokusen! Ore no Kobushi wa Hyakuman Volt!!
La Croce del Sud
Le vaisseau des sables
悪夢の総力戦! 俺の拳は100万ボルト!!

REGULAR.description:
Shin`s creation, Southern Cross, is thrust into chaos by Balcom`s rebellion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il complotto
Ken l’invincible
Makyuu Enjou! Shin! Omae made Ato Ippo Da!!
The Evil Palace Aflame! One Last Step to Shin!
魔宮炎上! シン! お前まであと一歩だ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro finally confronts his old nemesis, Shin. But he is shocked to hear that Yuria has already committed suicide and left this world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion of Part One: Yuria Forever... and Shin!!
Dai Ichi Bu Kanketsu: Yuria Towa ni.... Soshite Shin yo!
Duello finale
Le combat final
第一部完結 ユリア永遠[とわ]に.... そしてシンよ!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and the others leave Southern Cross behind. They run afoul of Kemda and the Fang Clan, but defeat them easily.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Ni Bu: Fuuun Ryuukohen - Ore o Matsu no wa Tatakai Dake na no ka!!
Guerra!
La tribu sauvage
Part Two: The Tumultuous Dragon and Tiger! Only Battles Waits for Me?!
第二部 風雲龍虎編 俺を待つのは 戦いだけなのか!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro struggles against Kemda. But then the mysterious Rei appears, a man who dresses as a woman to lure in villains and slaughter them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`uccello d`acqua
La rencontre
Nanto Suichouken! Tsuyosugita Otoko-tachi no Higeki ga Hajimatta!!
South Star Waterfowl Fist! The Beginning of a Tragedy of Men Too Strong!!
南斗水鳥拳! 強すぎた 男たちの悲劇が始まった!!

REGULAR.description:
Mamiya`s brother Kou is attacked by the Fang Clan and publicly executed. A strawberry for Mamiya`s birthday cake is found on his remains.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I lamponi
Sinners! Thy Name Is Fang Clan!!
Tsumibukaki Monodomo! Sono Na wa Kiba Ichizoku!!
Vengeance
罪深き者ども! その名は牙一族!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Rei, North Star and South Star, set out to exterminate the Fang Clan.

titles.title: Furuete Nemure! Yogiri no Tani no Akutoudomo!!
La vendetta dei Cobra
Les Kibas passent à l’attaque
Tremble As You Sleep! Villains in the Valley of Night Mist!
震えて眠れ! 夜霧の谷の悪党ども!!

REGULAR.description:
The Boss Fang shows his trump card: he has hunted down and captured Rei`s sister, Airi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutou Dake ga Waratte Iru! Konna Jidai ga Kiniira nee!!
All`inseguimento dei Cobra
La quête impossible
Only the Evil Laugh! I Can`t Stand the World We Live In!!
悪党だけが笑っている! こんな時代が気にいらねえ!!

REGULAR.description:
To rescue Airi, Mamiya heads to meet the Boss Fang and declares herself Kenshiro`s fiance, but is kidnapped.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il combattimento
Les otages
Rei! I`ll Catch Your Tears with My Fist!!
Rei! Omae no Namida wa Ore no Kobushi de Ukete Yaru!!
レイ! お前の涙は 俺の拳で受けてやる!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro tells Rei about the seven scars on his chest, and Rei believes him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inochigoi wa Ososugiru! Jigoku e Ochiro Kiba Daiou!!
Ken et son double
Too Late to Beg for Mercy! Go to Hell, Emperor Fang!
Vivere o morire
命ごいは遅すぎる! 地獄へ落ちろ牙大王!!

REGULAR.description:
One man has been calling himself Kenshiro and perpetuating acts of cruelty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combattimento fatale
Destiny Looms Near! Jagi, Who Are You?
Le combat fraternel
Shukumei wa Shinobiyoru! Jagi Omae wa Nanimono!!

REGULAR.description:
The feeble Mako and his younger brother Aki live in a town under Jagi`s control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cercando Jagger
Jigoku no Tekkamen! Hokuto o Nanoru kyouaku Narumono yo!!
L’usurpateur
The Iron Mask from Hell! The Fiend Who Calls Himself the North Star!!
地獄の鉄仮面! 北斗を名のる凶悪なる者よ!!

REGULAR.description:
Jagi chooses the roof of a 200 meter-tall building for the site of his showdown.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aspetta all`inferno Jagger
Doken Yonrendan! Jagi Jigoku de Matte Iro!!
Four Strikes of Fury! Jagi, Wait for Me In Hell!!
Retourne en enfer, Jagger
怒拳四連弾! ジャギ地獄で待っていろ!!

REGULAR.description:
Word has it that Toki is a demon, who repeatedly performs fearsome human experiments.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il salvatore diabolico
Koko ga Kiseki no Mura! Datenshi wa Maiorita!!
Le village des miracles
This is the Village of Miracles! A Fallen Angel Has Arrived!
ここが奇跡の村! 堕天使は舞い降りた!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro enters the village of miracles, defeats a man modified by Toki, and heads towards Toki himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entre l’ange et le démon
Il cacciatore di cavie
Toki yo! Omae wa Tenshi na no ka Akuma na no ka!!
Toki! Are You an Angel or a Devil?!
トキよ! お前は 天使なのか悪魔なのか!!

REGULAR.description:
Yu, part of the caravan that picked Lin up, has fallen ill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il cambiamento di Toki
Jaaku naru mono yo! Toki omae no kokoro wa kusatte iru!!
Le fier renégat
The Evil One! Toki, Your Heart Is Completely Rotten!!
邪悪なる者よ! トキ・お前の心は腐っている!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro finally faces off against Toki. Though he may be Kenshiro`s brother, evil must be defeated!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Look Back! Hate Only Evil and Strike Toki!!
Furikaeru kako wa nai! Tada aku o nikumi Toki o utsu!!
Le cobaye
Scambio di persona
ふりかえる過去はない! ただ悪を憎みトキを撃つ!!

REGULAR.description:
Bathed in the ashes of death, Toki gives up his position as successor.

titles.title: Aete Ai o Kobamu! Shi o Yobu Kyousei o Seou ga Yue ni...!!

Non amarmi Mamia
À la recherche de Toki
あえて愛を拒む! 死を呼ぶ 凶星を背負うがゆえに...!!

REGULAR.description:
The warden Uighur has guessed that Kenshiro cannot kill women, and sends Bella, the successor to the Crimson Fist of Lotus Mountain, against him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crimson Orchid Mountain Fist! A Birth of a Tragic Woman!!
La tragedia di Bella
Le destin tragique de Bella
Ranzan Kurenaiken! Jidai wa Kanashii Onna o Unda!!
蘭山紅拳! 時代は悲しい女を生んだ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and the others finally reach Cassandra.

Les portes de l’enfer
凶悪の伝説! カサンドラの門がいま開かれる!!

REGULAR.description:
Cassandra`s gate opens.

titles.title: Akutoudomo ni Bohyou wa Iranu! Koko wa Jigoku no Cassandra!!

悪党どもに墓標はいらぬ! ここは地獄のカサンドラ!!

REGULAR.description:
While Kenshiro and Mamiya fight in Cassandra, Lin and Bat hold onto hope and wait for news of their victory.

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro`s group heads into prison to reunite with Toki, but Ken-oh`s Royal Guard stands in their way.

titles.title: Asunaki Seikimatsu! Ken Omae o Matte Ita!!

Un incontro difficile
明日なき世紀末! ケンおまえを待っていた!!

REGULAR.description:
Toki and Ken are finally reunited. Toki smashes through the attacking Royal Guard with the North Star Humane Face Breaker.
Source: crunchyroll

La chute de Cassandra
La nuova leggenda

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and the others leave Cassanra behind for the town where Lin, Bat and Airi are waiting.

Ken-oh`s Assault Squadron attacks the village where Lin and the others wait.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il coraggio della piccola Lynn
Lynn montre son courage
Shinigami ni Obierumono yo! Lin no Atsui Kokoro no Sakebi o Kike!!
Those Who Fear the Reaper! Listen to the Voice of Lin`s Fiery Soul!
死神におびえる者よ! リンの熱き心の叫びを聞け!!

REGULAR.description:
Lin`s bravery in the face of certain death inspires courage within the villagers, who mount a resistance against the assault squadron.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku kara no Yobigoe! Rei Omae wa Shichousei o Mitaka!!
La rivolta
Le soulèvement
Voices from Hell! Rei, Did You See the Death Omen Star?
地獄からの呼び声! レイお前は死兆星を見たか!!

REGULAR.description:
Rei challenges Raoh, but Raoh`s fighting spirit alone overwhelms him. Raoh defeats Rei with a single finger, without ever dismounting from his steed, Kokuoh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entre la vie et la mort
La leggenda della paura
Nanto Suichouken Shi no Mai! Ai no Tame Ore no Inochi Kurete Yarou!!
The South Star Waterfowl Fist`s Dance of Death! I`ll Give My Life for Love!!
南斗水鳥拳死の舞! 愛のためオレの命くれてやろう!!

REGULAR.description:
Rei tries desperately to stop Kenshiro from challenging Raoh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Explosion of Secret Techniques! Beyond Hatred Is the Fate for the Brothers of the North Star
La mossa segreta
Le sacrifice
Ougi Bakuretsu! Hokuto Nikyoudai no Shukumei wa Nikushimi o mo Koeta!!
奥義爆裂! 北斗二兄弟の宿命は 憎しみをも越えた!!

REGULAR.description:
Mamiya tries to save Toki by firing a bowgun at Raoh, but the Two-Finger Vacuum Grasp sends the arrow back at her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Face à face
Lotta all`ultimo sangue
Shijou Saikyou no Tatakai Raou tai Ken! Shinu no wa Kisama Da!!

史上最強の戦いラオウVSケン! 死ぬのはきさまだ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Raoh`s fight comes to a close, but Rei has three days left to live.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 72 Hours to Live! The Death Omen Star Drags Rei In!!
Cani sacri
L`homme aux chiens
Shi no Senkoku 72 Jikan! Shichousei ga Rei o Hikizuru!!
死の宣告72時間! 死兆星がレイを引きずる!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Rei arrive at Medicine City to rescue Mamiya, who was captured by Galf.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asunaki Sadame! Soredemo Onna wa Ai o Shinjiru!!
Fate Without Tomorrow! And Yet, A Woman Believes in Love!!
Le secret de Mamiya
Sacrificio d`amore
明日なき運命[さだめ]! それでも女は愛を信じる!!

REGULAR.description:
The man who carved the initials UD into Mamiya`s shoulder was Yuda, the traitorous bearer of the Star of Enchantment and one of the 108 styles of the South Star Sacred Fist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bellezza crudele
L’étoile de la traitrise
Nanto Rokuseiken Yuda! Ore wa Dareyorimo Utsukushii!!
Yuda of the South Star Six Sacred Fist! I`m the Most Beautiful!!
南斗六聖拳ユダ! 俺は誰よりも美しい!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro`s group heads for the town of Buldan in pursuit of Yuda, then gets ambushed by a group of boys.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le donne rapite
Les esclaves de la beauté
Shichousei Semaru!! Rei! Ten wa Zankoku ni Toki o Kizamu!
The Death Omen Star Looms! Rei! How Cruel Time Passes By!
死兆星迫る!! レイ! 天は残酷に時を刻む!

REGULAR.description:
Rei has only a short time left to live.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai Suru Mamiya! Sono Hitomi no Kagayaki ni Shichousei ga Hisomu!!
Beloved Mamiya! The Death Omen Star Lurks Behind the Sparkle in Your Eyes!
La grande prova
Le bout de la route
愛するマミヤ! その瞳の輝きに死兆星がひそむ!!

REGULAR.description:
Dedicating the tiny remainder of his life to Mamiya, Rei seeks Yuda`s defeat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il volo dell`uccello bianco
Le dernier combat
Rei, Are You on Your Way to Death? A Man Is Beautiful Than Ever!!
Shini Iku no ka Rei! Ima Otoko wa Koko made Utsukushii!!
死に行くのかレイ! 今・男はここまで美しい!!

REGULAR.description:
Rei is saved from peril by Kenshiro`s fist, and Yuda`s eyes are dazzled by the beauty of Rei`s techniques.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beautiful Warriors, Rei vs. Yuda! A Man`s Passage Needs No Tears!!
La fin de Rei
Un uomo solo
Utsukushiki Kenshi Rei tai Yuda! Otoko no Hanamichi ni Namida wa Iranu!!
美しき拳士レイVSユダ! 男の花道に涙はいらぬ!!

REGULAR.description:
Rei locks himself in a house alone to await his final moments, not wanting his miserable death to be seen by others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dainibu Kanketsu: Saraba Rei! Jidai wa Yuusha no Densetsu o Kataritsugu
End of Part Two: Farewell, Rei! Heroic Legend Will Be Told Throughout the Ages!
La storia dell`uomo immortale
Naissance d’une légende
第2部完結 さらばレイ! 時代は勇者の伝説を語り継ぐ

REGULAR.description:
After seeing Rei through his final moments, Kenshiro begins his journey once again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beginning of Part Three: Supreme Rules in Turbulence! As the South Star Fades, the North Star Appears!!
Daisanbu Kaishi: Ransei Hadouhen - Nanto Midarurutoki Hokuto Arawareri!!

Le colonel Sauzer
第3部開始 乱世覇道編 南斗乱るる時北斗現われり!!

REGULAR.description:
Shu is a blind man who wields one of the South Star Six Sacred Fists.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il tempio del potere
L’oiseau du vent
Ten o Oou Ankoku no Hoshi! Shitou no Hate ni Jidai wa Ugoku!!
The Star of Darkness Engulfs the Heavens! Time Evolves Beyond the Deathmatch!
天をおおう暗黒の星! 死闘の果てに時代は動く!!

REGULAR.description:
Souther`s forces abduct children and conscript them for the construction of his Holy Cross Mausoleum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les yeux du futur
Nanto Hakuroken Shuu! Omae wa Kono Seikimatsu ni Nani o Miru no ka!!
Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! What Will You Witness in the End of the Century?!
Sperare nel domani

REGULAR.description:
The Holy Emperor`s forces` Garzus Squadron, attacks a young resistance member named Jay, and then the village where his fiance is hidden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La luce della vita
Le fiancé
Love on the Battlefield! Must the Time Tear Love Apart!?
Senjou no Koi! Jidai wa Ai o mo Hikisaku no ka!!
戦場の恋! 時代は愛をも引き裂くのか!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro hits secret pressure points on Peji and Giji, wielders of the South Star Twin Cutting Swords, then finally faces Souther.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Am Souther, the Holy Emperor! I Disallow Love and Compassion!
Il re del mondo
La goutte d’eau

俺は聖帝サウザー! 愛も情も許さない!!

REGULAR.description:
Even after hitting the deadly secret pressure point, the "jinchukyoku," Kenshiro cannot hold his ground against Souther`s overwhelming might.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Young Hero Challenges His Fate! Your Screaming Soul Shall Move the Heavens!!
Due destini simili
L’invincibilité de Sauzer

REGULAR.description:
Upon hearing from Kenshiro that Shiba died to save him, Shu is stricken with both grief and pride for his son.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Bloody Battle, Shu vs. Souther! Love, Drowned in the Tears of the Star of Benevolence!!

The Holy Emperor`s forces` Garzus Squadron, attacks a young resistance member named Jay, and then the village where his fiance is hidden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chi no Juujiryou! Shuu! Sono Namida wa Ore no Kokoro de Uketomeyou!!
La piramide della croce
L’épreuve de force

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro reaches the Holy Cross Mausoleum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il futuro ti appartiene

走れケンシロウ! また一人友が死んで行く!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Souther face off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash of the Polar Stars, Ken vs. Souther! My Star Is the Only Protector of Heaven!!

Una vittima dell`amore
極星激突ケンVSサウザー! 天を守るは我が星一つ!!

REGULAR.description:
Souther puts his pride as Holy Emperor on the line with his undefeated technique, the Heaven Soaring Cross Phoenix.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ultimo volo della fenice
La fin d’une étoile
Souther, the Despondent Holy Emperor! You Are Weary from Love!!
悲しき聖帝サウザー! お前は愛につかれている!!

REGULAR.description:
Raoh`s fighting spiritual energy surges, and a steely gleam returns to his eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Critical Times of the North Star! Three Brothers of Fate Are on the Move!!
Le destin des 3 frères
Sete di dominio
北斗最強の時代! 遂に動きだした宿命の3兄弟!!

REGULAR.description:
To gauge his own injuries, Raoh chooses Koryu as his opponent.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La guérison totale
Mouhitotsu no Hokuto Shinken! Raoh o Yami ni Homuri Zare!!
The Other Divine Fist of the North Star! Drive Raoh to Oblivion!!

もう一つの北斗神拳! ラオウを闇に葬り去れ!!

REGULAR.description:
Toki and Raoh battle in past and present.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La morte è di scena
La révélation des origines de Raoul et Toki
The Secret of Origin Revealed! The Heaven Prefers Tragedy!!
暴かれた出生の秘密! 天はいたずらに悲劇を好む!!

REGULAR.description:
The curtain of destiny draws to a close over Toki and Raoh. Raoh`s Battle Strength Summons gathers all of Toki`s fighting power into Toki`s fists.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu Toki
Farewell, Toki! A Man Only Cries Once!!
Le ultime lacrime
さらばトキ! 男の涙は一度だけ!!

REGULAR.description:
A village once ruled by Ken-oh is now ruled by brigands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`uomo di Sirio
L’homme de Cirius
Ryuga of Sirius! I`ll Seize the Rainbow in Tempest!!
天狼星の男リョウガ! 俺は乱世に虹をつかむ!!

REGULAR.description:
Sirius, a lone star associated with neither the South Star nor the North Star.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Wolf Running in the Horizon! There Lies the End of Love and Hatred!!
Alla ricerca di un nuovo eroe
Le retour de Raoul, roi d’Hokuto
地平線を駆ける狼! そこは愛と憎しみの果て!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro visits a town dominated by the Sabat gang, and strikes the gluttonous Sabat down by hitting a secret pressure point.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Forgive Me, My Sister! I Am Destined to Clash with the North Star!!
Ken affronte l’homme de Cirius
Occhi di ghiaccio
許せ妹よ! 北斗を襲うはわが星の宿命[さだめ]!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro arrives in a village under Ryuga`s control, and Garoh draws his blade upon him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Iron Fist for the Roaring Wolf! Toki Is in Danger!!
Chi sarà il re del mondo?
La provocation de Ryuga
吠える狼に鉄拳を 今, トキが危ない!!

REGULAR.description:
After Ryuga abducts Toki, Kenshiro pursues Ryuga to his castle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion of Part Three: Let the New Age Awaken! The Wolf`s Howl Moves the Heaven!!
Explications
Il sacrificio
第3部完結 目ざめよ新時代! 狼の叫びが天を衝く!!

REGULAR.description:
The man who marked the beginning of Kenshiro`s fateful journey.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amore impossibile
Nanto Seiken Shin! Omae wa Mukuwarenu Ai ni Inochi o Kaketa!!
Shin of the South Star Sacred Fist! Risked Your Life for Love That Never Will!!
À la recherche de Julia

REGULAR.description:
Rei, a man of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, an elegant and beautiful art with unparalleled brutality.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`amicizia
Les sept cicatrices
Nanto Suichouken Rei! Tomo no Tame ni Shinda Otoko ga Ita!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuda, of the Star of Deception and its crimson gleam, deemed himself the most beautiful in the world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eterna leggenda
Nanto Koukakuken Yuda! Sono Utsukushiki Hohoemi ga Higeki o Yobu!!
Un combat pour la vie
Yuda of the South Star Crimson Crane Fist! His Beautiful Smile Calls for Tragedy!!
南斗紅鶴拳ユダ! その美しき微笑が悲劇を呼ぶ!!

REGULAR.description:
When Kenshiro was a boy, Shu of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, gave up his own light in exchange for Kenshiro`s life.

titles.title: Le sacrifice
Nanto Hakuroken Shuu! Ten wa Akumade Hijou na Shukumei o Kasu!!
Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! The Heaven Only Bestows Cruel Destinies!
l grande cieco
南斗白鷺拳シュウ! 天はあくまで非情な宿命を課す!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuda caused the destruction of the South Star Sacred Fist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Holy Emperor Souther! Your Deep Affection Consumes You in Love!!
Il dittatore
Seitei Souther! Omae wa Ai Fukaki Yueni Ai ni Oboreru!!
Un tyran aveuglé par la haine
聖帝サウザー! お前は愛深きゆえに愛におぼれる!!

REGULAR.description:
Ken-Oh steadily sends his troops forward, expanding his territory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion of Part Four: Raoh Must Die! The Legend Turns to Terror!!
Le sixième maître
Tortura disumana
第4部最終章 ラオウ死すべし! 伝説が恐怖に変わる!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro fights the Killer Machine Gren, created by Dabide, one of Ken-Oh`s followers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La brigata del vento
Le plan de Raoul
The South Star Strikes Back! The Wind Brigade Protects the Last General of the South Star!!
南斗の逆襲! 風の旅団よ最後の将を守れ!!

REGULAR.description:
The Wind Brigade destroys Ken-Oh`s forces in several locations to draw Ken-Oh out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La notte degli echi
Le maître du vent
Prelude to a Deathmatch! The Screams of Hyui of the Wind Echoes in the Heaven!!
死闘への序幕! 風の男ヒューイの叫びが天にこだます!!

REGULAR.description:
Morgan, the chief of the vanguard forces for Ken-Oh, values cars more than human lives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`armata delle fiamme rosse
Les flammes de Shuren
The Burning Crimson Brigade! Shuren Is Drenched in Tears of Flame!!
燃える真紅の軍団! 炎の涙がシュレンをぬらす!!

REGULAR.description:
Shuren`s unit faces Ken-Oh`s forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Five Chariot Stars in Danger! Raoh Has Finally Pierced Through the Flames!!

Le géant invincible
危うし五車星! 遂にラオウが炎をも突き破った!!

REGULAR.description:
The mysterious Fudo tails Kenshiro and the others.

Une nouvelle amitié

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro finds a group of bandits using Ken-Oh`s name, and finishes them off with the Cross Neck Face Breaker and the Mountain Fissuring Wave.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I briganti del re
Plus haut dans les nuages
The Crisis Is Near! Destiny Awaits at the Capital of the South Star!
風雲急を告ぐ! ケン, 宿命が 南斗の都で待っている!!

REGULAR.description:
Ken-Oh`s pike brigade appears before Kenshiro, and he strikes a pressure point on their commander, Yakob.

titles.title: I Am Juza of the Clouds! I Shall Move with the Flow of Time!!
L`ultimo guerriero
Le refus
俺は雲のジュウザ! 時の流れに身を任す!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and the others are taken to a village run by Dolfi, an agent of Ken-Oh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La legge è uguale per tutti
Qui se cache sous le masque du général ?
The Clouds Remain! The Masked General Is Finally Revealed!!
雲いぜん動かず! 遂に仮面の将が素顔を見せた!!

REGULAR.description:
While Kenshiro comes to a bridge checkpoint and finishes off Balda`s squad with the "North Star Toric Murderous Kick Attack!", Raoh continues to advance his main troops forward.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juza of the Clouds Resurrects! I Have No Fear for Raoh!!
Le retour de Jûza des nuages
Nessuno fermerà Juza
よみがえった雲のジュウザ! 俺はラオウを恐れない!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and the others set out for the South Star capital, but Ken-Oh`s Assassin Squad appear before them. Kenshiro dodges Jenimo`s two-sword style and gives him a pounding!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Due giorni di attesa
Juza vs. Raoh! An End of the Legend of the Invincible!!
Le combat de Jûza contre Raoul ! La légende de l`invincible prend fin !!
対決ジュウザVSラオウ! 今無敵伝説に終止符を!!

REGULAR.description:
With Kokuoh gone and his mobility cut off, Raoh sends Zaku`s squad at Kenshiro to try to stop him as well.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fudo in Peril! Hurry, Ken, A Man Must Not Abandon His Friends!!
La grande forza dell`amore
Un grand danger menace Fudo ! Ken, un homme n`abandonne jamais ses amis !!
フドウ絶体絶命! 急げケン, 男は友を見すてない!!

REGULAR.description:
Fudo dives into a bottomless quicksand pit to save his children.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Due sguardi innocenti
Le piège impitoyable des sables mouvants ! Qui viendra sauver Fudo d`une mort imminente ?
Treacherous Quicksand! Will the Hand of Salvation Reach Fudo?
非情の砂地獄! 死する フドウに救いの手は届くのか!!

REGULAR.description:
For the last South Star general, Juza fights Ken-Oh again, and risks receiving the first strike.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juza Falls! I`ll Give My Life to Protect the Woman I Love!!
La fin de Jûza ! Je protégerai la femme que j`aime au péril de ma vie !!
La grande vallata
ジュウザ倒る! 俺は命を捨てても愛する女を守ろう!!

REGULAR.description:
Having learned who the last general is, Kenshiro dispatches one of Ken-Oh`s squads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu Julia ! Même en expirant, le brave tait son amour !!
Corsa verso la libertà
Farewell Yuria! A Strong Man Will Not Speak of Love, Even in Death!!
さらばユリア! 強き男は死しても愛を語らず!!

REGULAR.description:
Raoh destroyed the Divine Fist of the North Star`s 2,000 years of history.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I due fratelli
La capitale du Nanto tremble ! Les deux frères du Hokuto arrivent enfin !!
The Capital of the South Star Trembles! The Two Brothers of the North Star Finally Arrive!!
Yureru Nanto no Miyako! Tsuini Hokuto 2 Kyoudai ga Yatte Kita!!
ゆれる南斗の都! 遂に北斗2兄弟がやってきた!!

REGULAR.description:
The last South Star general, who holds the key to conquering the century`s end, is Yuria.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La figlia del mare
Sadness of the Five Chariot Stars! Love and Destiny Looms Over the Woman!!
Triste étoile filante ! Tu es victime de l`amour et du destin !!
悲しき五車星! お前は愛と宿命をひきずる女!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro believes that Yuria will die unless he defeats Raoh, and is in a race to defeat him before reuniting with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`arcane ultime de la renaissance du néant ! Raoul, te voilà au pied du mur !!
L`ultimo segreto
The Ultimate Secret Technique, Unconscious Transmigration! Raoh, I`ve Got You Now!!
究極の奥義無想転生! ラオウ, 遂にお前を追いつめた!!

REGULAR.description:
Raoh`s legs buckle with fear under Kenshiro`s Divine Fist of the North Star Ultimate Secret Technique, the "Unconscious Transmigration".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Is It the End of Raoh and His Ambitions? The Heaven Hesitates Once Again!!
Raoul va-t-il tomber et son ambition avec lui ? Mais le ciel a encore chancelé !!
Una lotta interminabile
ラオウ倒れ野望果てるか? しかし天はまたよろめいた!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro, with his eyes wounded and his light stolen, sets out into the wasteland after Ken-Oh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il gigante indeciso
Raoh, the Confused Giant! I Don`t Believe in Love!!
Raoul, un géant égaré ! Je ne crois pas à l`amour !!
迷える巨人ラオウ! 俺は愛など信じない!!

REGULAR.description:
Fudo was once called a demon, and in his youth Raoh feared him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Challenge from the Devil! Fudo, Be the Demon for Those You Love!!
I dolci occhi del diavolo
Le défi du diable ! Fudô, change-toi en démon pour ceux que tu aimes !!
悪魔の挑戦状! フドウ, 愛する者のために鬼となれ!!

REGULAR.description:
Raoh and Fudo fight furiously, but the battle ends with Raoh at the advantage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bambini del futuro
Fudo, the Gentle Warrior! His Tears Awaken a Fiery Soul!!
Fudô, le héros bienveillant ! Ses larmes réveillent un cœur ardent !!
やさしき勇者フドウ! その涙は熱き心を呼びさます!!

REGULAR.description:
The Five Chariot Stars fall before Raoh, trying to protect the South Star Merciful Mother, Yuria. Rihaku, the last of the Five Chariot Stars, sees Hyui, Shuren, Juza and Fudo within the funeral pyre. Kenshiro swears not to let their souls pass on in vain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanto Jibosei o Mamore! Tatoe Gosha no Inochi Hateru Tomo!!
Protect the Merciful Mother of the South Star! Even If It`s the End of the Five Chariots!!
Protégez l`étoile de l`amour maternel du Nanto ! Même si les cinq étoiles filantes doivent toutes périr !!
Stelle per sempre
南斗慈母星を守れ! たとえ五車の生命[いのち]果てるとも!!

REGULAR.description:
News of Ken-Oh`s defeat causes upheaval in his troops, and before long his plans begin to crumble from the ground up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu ni Obieru Raou! Yuria, Mou Omae Shika Inai!!
Raoh, Shaken by a Nightmare! Yuria, You Are the Only One!!
Raoul est en plein cauchemar ! Julia, il n`y a plus que toi !!
Vivrai per sempre nel mio cuore
悪夢におびえるラオウ! ユリア, もうお前しかいない!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Raoh face off at the most holy of training grounds in the 2,000 year history of the North Star, The North Star Mind and Body Training Ground. Kenshiro possesses the Unconscious Transmigration, which only those who bear sadness can learn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen-jou wa Hokuto Renkitouza! Mou Dare mo Yatsura o Tomerarenai!!
Nessuno li fermerà
Showdown at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground! No One Can Stop Them Now!!
Ultime combat au temple de formation du Hokuto ! Plus personne ne les arrêtera !!
決戦場は北斗練気闘座! もう誰も奴らをとめられない!!

REGULAR.description:
Raoh unleashes a fierce fighting spirit. Enveloped within it, Kenshiro tells Raoh that each of their next blows will both be their last.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu frères du Hokuto ! Vous êtes allés au bout de l`amour et de la tristesse !!
Farewell, the Brothers of the North Star! They`re Beyond Love and Sorrow!!
La stella della morte
Saraba Hokuto 2 Kyoudai! Ima Futari wa Ai to Kanashimi no Hate ni!!
さらば北斗2兄弟! いま2人は愛と哀しみの果てに!!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshiro and Yuria first met at The North Star Mind and Body Training Ground.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion of the Final Chapter: Now Revealed!! The 2000 Year History of the North Star!!
Oyez, oyez ! 2 000 ans d`histoire du Hokuto !!
Promemoria
Saishuushou Kan: Ima Katarou! Hokuto 2000-nen no Rekishi!!
